name: MTLCounterSampleBufferDescriptor
desc: A configuration used to create a counter sample buffer.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A label for the counter sample buffer.

items.name: var sampleCount: Int
items.desc: The number of samples that can be stored in the buffer.

items.name: var storageMode: MTLStorageMode
items.desc: The storage mode to use for the sample buffer.
